name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) Tiny, Version 1.2
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.w3.org/TR/SVGMobile12/, http://www.w3.org/2008/12/REC-SVGTiny12-20081222-errata.html</field><field name="filenameExtension">svg, svgz</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: SVG 1.2 Tiny is a profile of SVG intended for implementation on a range of devices, including cellphones and PDAs.  SVG is a language for describing two-dimensional graphics in XML.
